decision_conditions: Condition 1 of planning permission 20/00977/FUL is amended as follows:The approved development shall be carried out in accordance with the following drawings/details:1925-PL8 06 B-EXISTING GROUND FLOOR PLAN1925-PL8 01 B-LOCATION PLAN1925-PL4 27 D-PROPOSED SOUTH ELEVATION HOUSES1925-PL8 02 B-EXISTING BLOCK PLAN1925-PL8 04 B-EXISTING SITE PLAN1925-PL8 05 B-EXISTING BASEMENT PLAN1925-PL8 07 B-EXISTING FIRST FLOOR PLAN1925-PL8 08 B-EXISTING ROOF PLAN1925-PL8 09 B-EXISTING ELEVATIONS1925-PL8 10 B-EXISTING ELEVATION AND SECTION1925-PL8 11-EXISTING WEST ELEVATION1925-PL9 03 -PROPOSED BLOCK PLAN1925-PL9 12 -PROPOSED HOUSES SITE PLAN1925-PL8 13 N-GROUND FLOOR PLAN (2)1925-PL8 14 K-FIRST FLOOR PLAN1925-PL9 15 B-SECOND FLOOR PLAN 1925-PL9 16 -ROOF PLAN1925-PL4 26 D-PROPOSED WEST ELEVATION1925-PL4 29 F-PROPOSED NORTH ELEVATION HOUSES1925-PL4 31 B-PROPOSED CROSS SECTION AAD001 CONCEPTUAL DRAINAGE STRATEGY PLAN1925-PL4 25 D-PROPOSED COURTYARD - WEST ELEVATION1925-PL9 22 -PROPOSED SOUTH - STREET ELEVATIONS1925-PL9 28 A-PROPOSED NORTH ELEVATION FLATS1925-PL4 30 D-PROPOSED WEST ELEVATION AND CROSS SECTION1925-PL4 24 G-PROPOSED COURTYARD - EAST ELEVATIONLLD1988-LAN-REP-001-02_LANDSCAPE DESIGN STRATEGY1925-PL8 34 A-PROPOSED COURTYARD - EAST ELEVATIONLegal Agreement dated 20.04.2021Reason: For the avoidance of doubt and in the interests of proper planning.
description: Non-Material Amendment to Planning Permission ref: 20/00977/FUL (Demolition of existing buildings and erection of a new 2 storey building with 3rd storey recess fronting Brighton Road, comprising flexible commercial space (use classes A1, A2 ,B1a, D1[medical]) on the ground floor and 7 residential dwellings above with 9 terraced properties to the rear, together with associated access, parking, waste, cycle storage and landscaping). Amendments to top floor of frontage block to reconfigure both top floor units, including the addition of a study and reposition of kitchen in unit 2.01 and reconfiguring unit 2.02, together with double doors onto balconies on both flats
